block.p: LUCENT TECHNOLOGIES INC., Murray Hill, N.J., said it would build a new semiconductor plant in Allentown, Pa., for $165 million, consolidating smaller facilities it has in the area.

IMAGYN MEDICAL TECHNOLOGIES Newport Beach, Calif., a manufacturer and marketer of gynecological and urological medical products, will sell its line of impotence products to Timm Research Co. for $25.8 million.
LUCENT TECHNOLOGIES INC., Murray Hill, N.J., said it would build a new semiconductor plant in Allentown, Pa., for $165 million, consolidating smaller facilities it has in the area.

IMAGYN MEDICAL TECHNOLOGIES Newport Beach, Calif., a manufacturer and marketer of gynecological and urological medical products, will sell its line of impotence products to Timm Research Co. for $25.8 million.
PROSIEBEN MEDIA A, Munich, Germany, will buy a 20 percent stake in Arete Image Software as part of a wider alliance with the U.S. special-effects software maker.
